title: Ticket #7431: Missing passwords.d directory in RPM packaging
description:
I installed minicondor from the OSG and CHTC repos and my SchedLog is filled with: 

12/13/19 11:39:43 (pid:22160) Can't open directory "/etc/condor/passwords.d" as PRIV_ROOT, errno: 2 (No such file or directory)

And the config seems to be coming from the param table: 

# condor_config_val -v sec_password_directory
SEC_PASSWORD_DIRECTORY = /etc/condor/passwords.d
 # at: <Default>
 # raw: SEC_PASSWORD_DIRECTORY = /etc/condor/passwords.d

Ivan on condor users also noted this when trying to use condor_store_cred.
